title: You can currently bag luxury Mediterranean and Greek islands cruises from £649pp
text:

Winter may be fast approaching but if you're already dreaming of sunnier shores, then you may want to consider a cruise onboard Rhapsody of the Seas!

That's because the Royal Caribbean cruise ship is sailing to some very glamorous sun-soaked hotspots next year - and you can currently bag some discounted packages.

We're talking cruises visiting some of the best Greek islands , historic cities like Dubrovnik, and heaps more breathtaking Mediterranean hotspots.

Then of course there's the cruise ship itself, which has everything you could want for a glamorous holiday.

We're talking swish, spacious cabins with ensuite bathrooms and plush furniture, heaps of dining venues whether you're after gourmet dishes or casual dining, and some brilliant entertainment.

(Image: Royal Caribbean)

In fact, you're unlikely to be bored thanks to the on-board casino, nightclub, rock climbing wall, running track, swimming pool and luxury spa.

The good news is that you won't need to break the bank if you want to be on board one of the sailings.

That's because Mirror Cruise currently has a host of deals on Rhapsody of the Seas itineraries - and we've picked out three we think need to be on your radar.

Check out the deals below...

(Image: Royal Caribbean)

1. Venice, Split and the Greek Isles from £649pp

This seven-night holiday includes one night in Venice with a FREE handpicked hotel stay, and six nights sailing on a round-trip from Venice to ports of call including Split, Athens and Katakolon.

Price includes return flights and is based on a 10th July 2020 departure.

The holiday usually costs £999pp but you can currently find prices from £649pp on Mirror Cruise .

(Image: Getty Images)

2. Greece and Dubrovnik from £699pp

An eight-night holiday including one night in Venice with a FREE handpicked hotel stay, and seven nights sailing on a round-trip from Venice to ports of call including Dubrovnik, Kotor, Santorini and Katakolon.

Price includes return flights and is based on departures between May and September.

The holiday usually costs £1,199pp but you can currently find prices from £699pp on Mirror Cruise .

3. Kotor and Greek Gems from £699pp

The eight-night holiday includes one night in Venice with a FREE handpicked hotel stay, and seven nights sailing on a round-trip from Venice to ports of call including Kotor, Corfu, Piraeus(Athens), Mykonos and Kefalonia.

Price includes return flights and is based on departures between May and October.

The holiday usually costs £1,199pp but you can currently find prices from £699pp on Mirror Cruise .

Prices are based on two people sharing an inside cabin but upgrades to outside and balcony cabins are available for an extra fee.

All prices correct at time of writing and are subject to change and avaiability.
description: Cruise ship Rhapsody of the Seas is heading on some glamorous Mediterranean itineraries and you can currently bag discounts
